snippet: Investigators concluded that a blaze that killed a family in Carmel, N.Y., was started by ash that was flicked unintentionally into a bed of mulch in front of the house.
abstract: Putnam County investigators conclude that a fire that killed a family in Carmel, NY, was started by a cigarette ash from Thomas Sullivan Jr, son in the family and the only survivor of the blaze.
lead_paragraph: Investigators concluded that a blaze that killed a family in Carmel, N.Y., was started by ash that was flicked unintentionally into a bed of mulch in front of the house.

headline.seo: Son’s Cigarette Caused Fatal Carmel Fire, Police Say
headline.main: Son’s Cigarette Caused Fatal Fire in Putnam County, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Son’s Cigarette Caused Fire, Police Say
